item.title: From Ritual to Recursion: Integrating Froese's Ritualised-Mind Hypothesis with the Eve Theory of Consciousness
item.description: TL;DR Froese’s Ritualised-Mind Hypothesis (RMH) suggests ritual ordeal initiated subject-object separation. Eve Theory of Consciousness (EToC) extends RMH with specific catalysts (e.g., venom) and agents (females). This synthesis connects RMH/EToC to modern neural theories (GNW, IIT, PP, AST, HOT). 1 Problem Statement Two questions frame the evolution of human consciousness: Installation - How did reflective subjectâ€“object separation first become part of hominin development? Implementation - What neural or informational architecture realises conscious experience in any mind, ancient or modern?
